headline: An S&P Global International Insider Bought Up Stock
summary: An analysis shows that six members of the company’s management team and two board members have increased their holdings.

headline: The SaaS-pocalypse Crushes S&P Global — Is the Data Giant a Screaming Buy?
summary: S&P Global (NYSE:SPGI) shares have plunged due to the so-called “SaaS-pocalypse” sell-off that hit software-as-a-service stocks hard. That was followed by another sharp drop after the global ratings and index provider’s fourth-quarter earnings report. While it beat revenue expectations, guidance for 2026 came in below forecasts. Still, the company showed solid growth across segments and ... The SaaS-pocalypse Crushes S&P Global — Is the Data Giant a Screaming Buy?
